description: After CfA Workers united requested for voluntary recognition of their union on August 2nd, Code for America voluntarily recognized CfA Workers United Union on October 22, 2021. CfA is one of the first unions in civic tech, and a unionized contract is under negotiation.
author: wynniechan
addresses: Code for America, 155, 9th Street, SOMA Pilipinas, San Francisco, San Francisco City and County, San Francisco, California, 94103, United States
